Posts.Content: Oct 5, 2017 11:28PM Pdc wrote: Tomorrow will be my last treatment on the right side with SAVI, and I will be free of the catheter tomorrow afternoon! Woohoo!!! It has been easy and painless. I recommend it to anyone eligible for it. On Monday, I will start external beam radiation on the left side for 5 weeks.
Posts.Title: Starting Radiation October 2017 DodgersGirl DodgersGirl
